DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether high ligation of spermatic vein by open operation and microsurgery for patients with are effective in the treatment of varicocele and to determine which surgical option is better.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect and Prognosis of Different Operations on Varicocele - a Single-center Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: 1.infertile patient suffering from varicocele 2.severe varicocele patient with obvious symptoms 3.adolescents suffering from severe varicocele with or without orchiatrophy 1.varicocele patient with abdominal infection 2.varicocele patient who has massive adhesion of pelvic tissue due to pelvic surgery history 3.mild varicocele 4.varicocele patient has no obvious symptoms if has have born children, suffer from idiopathic azoospermiaï¼Œor their partner can't bear children
